Kim Jong Il's work published in India 
    Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "Socialism is a Science" was published in booklet by the All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association on August 30.
 The work released on Nov. 1, Juche 83 (1994) clarifies that people-centered socialism is the most scientific, advantageous and powerful socialism and that socialism is sure to win for its scientific accuracy and truthfulness.

articles.title: Preview of multi-part feature film "The Nation and Destiny" part 55 held
articles.content:
DPRK marathoner comes first 
    Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK woman marathoner Ham Pong Sil came first in the women half-marathon race of the 21st World Universiad held in Beijing yesterday.
 Kim Chang Ok took the third place in the same race.

articles.title: U.S. hard-line policy flailed
articles.content:
Preview of multi-part feature film "The Nation and Destiny" part 55 held 
    Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The Korean Film Studio recently produced part 4 of "Yesterday, Today and Tomorrow," part 55 of the multi-part feature film "The Nation and Destiny." The film shows that the revolutionary faith is an important matter decisive of the coordinates of the human life.
 A preview of this film was held at the people's palace of culture yesterday.    
 The film teaches that the outlook on happiness of people in the present era lies in their devoted service not for today but for tomorrow when the country will prosper.  It also stresses that the revolutionary faith and conscience should be kept to the last under any conditions.
